info.name: any number too
info.description:
an interesting result. a solution which takes a random number from a uniform distribution set (or area), and converge to a unique new constant for any random value in that area.
left: area of random numbers
right: final value from any random number

renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
// text //

// vxlmono
		   // Font Size: 7x6px
		   // offset = ascii_code(character) - ascii_code(' ')
		   // data = vxlmono[lut[offset]]

const ivec2 font_size = ivec2(7, 6);

const int data[] = int[](

#define RES iResolution.xy

void draw_character(inout float text_out, in vec2 location, in vec2 uv, int character, in vec2 R)
{
    int base = character - 32;
    
    ivec2 diff = ivec2(floor(uv * R - location * R));
    
    if ( all(greaterThanEqual(diff, ivec2(0))) && all(lessThan(diff, font_size)) ) {
        ivec2 offset = clamp(diff, ivec2(0), font_size - 1);
        text_out += float(bool( (data[lut[base] + ((font_size.y - 1) - offset.y)] & (1 << offset.x)) ));   
    }
}

#define draw_string(text_out, location, uv, characters, res) for (int i = 0 ; i < characters.length() ; ++i) { draw_character(text_out, (location * res + vec2(i * (font_size.x), 0)) / res, uv, characters[i], res); }

void draw_number(inout float text_out, in vec2 location, in vec2 uv, float number, in vec2 R)
{
    const uint digits = 6u; // maximum integer part digits, also maximum fractional digits
    uint ipart = uint(floor(abs(number)));
    
    // integer part
    uint values[digits] = uint[digits](0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u);
    uint i = 0u;
    while(0u != ipart) {
        uint ivalue = (ipart % 10u);
        ipart = ipart / 10u;
        
        values[i] = ivalue;
        ++i;
    }
    
    bool leading = true;
    int p = int(digits) - 1;
    i = 0u;
    while(p >= 0) {
        
        if (0u == values[p] && leading) {
            --p;
            continue;
        }
            
        draw_character(text_out, (location * R + vec2(i * uint(font_size.x), 0)) / R, uv, int(uint(zero) + values[p]), R);
        ++i;
        --p;
        leading = false;
    }
    
    if (leading) {
        draw_character(text_out, (location * R + vec2(i * uint(font_size.x), 0)) / R, uv, zero, R);
        ++i;
    }
    
    // point
    draw_character(text_out, (location * R + vec2(i * uint(font_size.x), 0)) / R, uv, period, R);
    ++i;
    
    float fpart = fract(abs(number));
    float period_offset = float(font_size.x) * 0.5f;
    
    // fractional part
    p = int(digits);
    while(0 != p) {
        fpart = fpart * 10.0f;
        ipart = uint(floor(abs(fpart)));
        uint ivalue = (ipart % 10u);
        
        draw_character(text_out, (location * R + vec2(i * uint(font_size.x), 0) + vec2(-period_offset, 0)) / R, uv, int(uint(zero) + ivalue), R);
        ++i;
        --p;
    }
}

// text //
renderpass.name: Common
